channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Manage Ninja -- WP Fluent Forms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Manage Ninja -- WP Fluent Forms

item.title: CVE-2021-34620|2024-10-15T19:09:35.687Z -- wp%20manage%20ninja -- wp%20fluent%20forms
item.description: The WP Fluent Forms plugin < 3.6.67 for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery leading to stored Cross-Site Scripting and limited Privilege Escalation due to a missing nonce check in the access control function for administrative AJAX actions
